SEARCH
Package com.barrel

Class Barrel

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
com.barrel.Barrel
All Implemented Interfaces:
BarrelInt, Serializable, Remote
public class Barrel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements BarrelInt
Represents a Barrel node in the system. A Barrel is responsible for indexing URLs, performing searches, and managing linked pages. It communicates with the GatewayBarrel and other Barrels via RMI and multicast.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Barrel

      Barrel() throws IOException, SQLException
      Constructs a Barrel object with default properties. Initializes the Barrel's socket, database, multicast address, and message queue.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the multicast socket.
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while initializing the database.

  • Method Details

    • indexedUrl

      public boolean indexedUrl(String url) throws RemoteException
      Checks if a URL has been indexed by the Barrel.
      Specified by:
      indexedUrl in interface BarrelInt
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to check.
      Returns:
      True if the URL is indexed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • search

      public Site[] search(String[] words, int page) throws RemoteException
      Searches for sites containing the specified words.
      Specified by:
      search in interface BarrelInt
      Parameters:
      words - The words to search for.
      page - The page number of results to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An array of Site objects matching the search criteria.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • linkedPages

      public Site[] linkedPages(String url) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the linked pages for a given URL.
      Specified by:
      linkedPages in interface BarrelInt
      Parameters:
      url - The URL for which linked pages are requested.
      Returns:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the Barrel. Initializes the Barrel and connects to the GatewayBarrel. Starts the Recuperator and MessageProcessor threads. Receives multicast messages and adds them to the message queue.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.
